patterns: Do you know a joke about football?
Make me laugh with a football joke.
Tell me something funny about football.
responses: Why don't football players get hot? They have so many fans!
Why was the footballer upset on his day off? He couldn't kick it!
Why did the football team go to the bank? To get their quarterback!
Why is Cinderella so bad at football? She runs away from the ball!
What do you call a football team that never wins? The Avengers, they always lose first!
